Introduction

LIME (라임) was a Vietnamese girl group under V&K Entertainment. Originally a four member group, they debuted on May 26, 2015 with the digital single “Take It Slow”. They disbanded on May 13, 2019 due to the members’ contracts expiring. They also debuted in South Korea in 2015 with “Toc Toc Toc”, a remake of Lee Hyori‘s single of the same name.
